summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Financial Growth Advisor application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend loads correctly with professional design. Core AI-powered modules working including income generation, budget analysis, investment advice, opportunity scanning, education hub, and AI chat. Minor syntax error fixed in backend. Some frontend session management issues identified.

fixed_issues.issue: Syntax error on line 349 with escaped quotes in string comparison
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Fixed escaped quotes in education lessons filter

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent redirects to auth page during navigation, possible JWT token expiration handling

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (register, login, get user)
Income Generation module (generate and retrieve opportunities)
Budget Analysis module (analyze budget, get latest analysis)
Investment Advisor module (get advice, retrieve latest advice)
Opportunity Scanner module (scan opportunities, get latest scan)
Education Hub module (get lessons, complete lessons, track progress)
AI Chat module (send messages, get chat history)
Market Data integration (get market overview, stock quotes)
Landing page loads with professional emerald/lime design
Authentication page loads with proper form elements
Dashboard loads with navigation and financial metrics
All navigation menu items present and properly labeled
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate frontend session management issues causing intermittent redirects to auth page during navigation. Consider implementing better JWT token refresh handling or extending token expiration time.
